quotes.quote: HDX and the new centre are a leading innovation in the trustworthy use of data for humanitarian outcomes. They are a tremendous example of putting the principles of trust, accountability and action into practice.

quotes.quote: Using data helps us to get to the heart of the matter when it comes to assisting people who are in need.
quotes.author: Lilianne Ploumen

quotes.quote: The ultimate goal of the centre is to increase knowledge, so that people can respond quickly to save lives.
quotes.author: Moses Sitati
quotes.organization: former Manager of the HDX Data Lab Nairobi
